page.title: 03PUPILS' PETS
page.content: I CONDUCTED A SURVEY ABOUT PETS WITH ALL OF THE FIRST YEAR FORMS. 90 OUT OF 102 PUPILS HAD PETS. 75 HAD A CAT, 44 HAD A DOG,21 HAD A RABBIT, 15 HAD A BUDGERIGAR. ABOUT A QUARTER OF THE PUPILS ASKED KNEW HOW MUCH THEIR PETS COST TO KEEP, OF THESE 20 SAID THEY SPEND BETWEEN ONE AND FIVE POUNDS PER WEEK. 14 PEOPLE SAID THEY SPEND ONE POUND AND UNDER, 20 PEOPLE SAID THEY SPEND OVER FIVE POUNDS. NOBODY SAID THEY TOOK THEIR PET TO THE VET EVERY WEEK, 7 PEOPLE SAID THEY GO EVERY MONTH, AND 30 SAID THEY GO ONCE A YEAR. 10 PEOPLE SAID THEY EXERCISE THEIR DOG DOWN THE ROAD, 10 PEOPLE SAID THEY TAKE THEIR DOG ROUND THE GARDEN. 26 PEOPLE SAID THEY SPEND TWO HOURS WITH THEIR PETS EVERY DAY,18 SAID HALF AN HOUR AND 7 SAID ONE HOUR.
